com.mongodb.rhino
Class BSON

java.lang.Object
  com.mongodb.rhino.BSON

public class BSON
extends Object

Conversion between native Rhino objects and BSON.

This class can be used directly in Rhino.

Author:
Tal Liron

Constructor Detail

BSON

public BSON()
Method Detail

to

public static Object to(Object object)
Recursively convert from native JavaScript to BSON-compatible types.

Recognizes JavaScript objects, arrays, Date objects, RegExp objects and primitives.

Also recognizes JavaScript objects adhering to MongoDB's extended JSON, converting them to BSON types: {$oid:'objectid'}, {$binary:'base64',$type:'hex'}, {$ref:'collection',$id:'objectid'}.

Note that the {$date:timestamp} and {$regex:'pattern',$options:'options'} extended JSON formats are recognized as well as native JavaScript Date and RegExp objects.

Parameters:
object - A Rhino native object
Returns:
A BSON-compatible object

from

public static Object from(Object object)
Recursively convert from BSON to native JavaScript values.

Converts to JavaScript objects, arrays, Date objectss and primitives. The result is JSON-compatible.

Note that special MongoDB types (ObjectIds, Binary and DBRef) are not converted, but JSON.to(Object) recognizes them, so they can still be considered JSON-compatible in this limited sense. Use from(Object, boolean) if you want to convert them to MongoDB's extended JSON.

Parameters:
object - A BSON object
Returns:
A JSON-compatible Rhino object

from

public static Object from(Object object,
                          boolean extendedJSON)
Recursively convert from BSON to native JavaScript values.

Converts to JavaScript objects, arrays, Date objects, RegExp objects and primitives. The result is JSON-compatible.

Can optionally convert MongoDB's types to extended JSON: {$oid:'objectid'}, {$binary:'base64',$type:'hex'}, {$ref:'collection',$id:'objectid'}.

Note that even if they are not converted, JSON.to(Object) recognizes them, so they can still be considered JSON-compatible in this limited sense.

Parameters:
object - A BSON object
extendedJSON - Whether to convert extended JSON objects
Returns:
A JSON-compatible Rhino object
